feature.label: Axon Ivy Designer RD, CMS and webeditor Feature
feature.description:
This feature includes parts of the Axon Ivy Designer 6.1 Axon Ivy BUSINESS PROCESS MANAGEMENT
Axon Ivy enables highly sophisticated Business Process Management (BPM). As an integrated BPM suite, it covers all aspects of Business Process Management - from process design and process execution through user and system integration to process controlling - without changes of medium and on one single platform.
